space.arim.api.chat

Class JsonComponentBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • space.arim.api.chat.ComponentBuilder
      • space.arim.api.chat.JsonComponentBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentFramework, JsonComponentFramework, space.arim.universal.util.Stringable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JsonComponent.Builder

    public class JsonComponentBuilder
extends ComponentBuilder
implements JsonComponentFramework
    Helper class for creating individual json components.
    Author:
    A248

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JsonComponentBuilder()
      Creates an empty builder
      JsonComponentBuilder(ComponentFramework component)
      Creates a builder based on the given Component.
      JsonComponentBuilder(JsonComponentFramework component)
      Creates a builder based on the given JsonComponent.
      JsonComponentBuilder(String text)
      Creates a builder with the given content

      • JsonComponentBuilder

        public JsonComponentBuilder(JsonComponentFramework component)
        Creates a builder based on the given JsonComponent.
        The source JsonComponent's information is copied to the JsonComponentBuilder.
        Parameters:
        component - the source component

        Creates a builder based on the given Component.
        The source Component's information is copied to the JsonComponentBuilder.

        component - the source component
